website_summaries.verdict: A backless booster that still has anchors to help keep the seat steady in the car.
pros: Can handle a child up to 57" tall
Works well in a bucket seat
Has a latch system that helps keep the seat steady
Includes a cup holder and a little cubby to hold small items
Kids report this is a comfortable seat
cons: The tether straps on this model are a little short for some larger vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Latch system on these should be mandatory!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all: I had many people say it was a “waste of money to buy a booster seat with a latch system” IT IS NOT! I’m very much surprised that it’s not the standard. I love that it is secure and latch it to my carryon when traveling with my kid. There is no research to prove it is safer for your kid vs a non-latching booster seat, BUT it DOES 100% prevent it from being a projectile in your car if you were to get in an accident.
customer_reviews.author: M. Girgis

customer_reviews.title: Durable & soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old niece who I have daily & she loves the little drawer & how soft the armrests are. It seems very sturdy & durable. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Erwin

customer_reviews.title: and sturdy seats! I will be buying them again
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat saved my son's lives! They where in an accident....there seats did not budge at all! Thank you all for meeting such safe ...and sturdy seats! I will be buying them again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mama bear

customer_reviews.title: good balance between ease of use and secure installation
customer_reviews.text: This seat is sized well for our almost-4 year old, (about 40" tall, 40 lbs.) He's on the small end of where you can start using this seat so it should be fine as he grows. It's lightweight and easy to position, with a shoulder clip to adjust the car seatbelt if the position is too high. The optional clips attach to anchors in the car seat and are easy to engage and disengage in most cars. The only thing that would make it better would some type of built-in strap or handle for carrying, but it is possible to attach a third party strap to the anchor clips if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Levitt

customer_reviews.title: Offers safety and independence for your little one
customer_reviews.text: It's time for our 4.5 year old to upgrade from the big bulky car seat/booster combo to an easier-to-use booster. He has become more independent, and insistent on buckling/unbuckling himself, and the 5-point harness on the old booster was becoming too uncomfortable and difficult for him to latch. With this booster seat, It is now easy for him to buckle and unbuckle himself (which is nice, considering we have baby #3 on the way). It comes with a strap to position the shoulder strap, but honestly it's not really needed unless your child is in the middle seat of the third row of your van. Otherwise, the shoulder strap from your vehicle should come across your child's shoulder just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Why this is the better unit
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a LOT of booster seats and glad I chose this one. #1 reason is the LATCH pull system to ensure it's secure. The cupholder is the right size and the pull out tray is useful. Very light yet sturdy and quality product. Arm rests are in the right position. Very well designed and great value. Again, the key to this unit is the LATCH pull system. I also like the seat belt adjustment ring. It slides onto the shoulder seat belt of the child and pulls it down to the correct height for safety vs. putting it behind them and not having one or being too high on their neck / face.
customer_reviews.author: Orion2012

customer_reviews.title: The one hand front adjuster for the LATCH system is wonderful, and the positioner actually makes this even better ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why none of the pictures, or descriptions, mention that there is an accompanying shoulder belt positioner that comes with this booster which IMO really needs a 6th star. Finally caved in and replaced my son's 3-in-1 Graco child seat that he wore from ~18 months to 6 (literally on his 6th birthday) with this. The one hand front adjuster for the LATCH system is wonderful, and the positioner actually makes this even better than his old seat, He's at a size (~64 lbs, 4 ft flat) when the shoulder strap just doesn't quite sit right on him, and the shoulder belt positioner makes sure he's snugly belted in on all points.
customer_reviews.author: Jeancarlo

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional. Kid and parents happy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for (very tall) 5 year old son who had outgrown his car seat. He loves his "big boy" seat and I love that it is sturdy but very light and easy to pop in and out to change between vehicles. The LATCH tensioning/quick release system is great. You can loosen the straps with a push of a button and tighten them with one hand. All the other car seats we have had require a lot of fiddling around (sometimes with your hands squeezed under or behind the child seat) to adjust the LATCH straps. This is way better. Plus the fabric cover comes off so it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: CMT

customer_reviews.title: Attached to car seat hooks very Secure tight fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great booster seat, our 10 year old requested a new one she loves the cup holder even tho she has one already. Also the little tray for her toys. I love the fact that I can secure this to the car seat attachments to the seat and get it as tight as a car seat. Easy to take out and put back in also and love that we don’t have to just rely on the seat belt to hold her in and that the seat is so secure. Very cheap price for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Cup UNDER chair. Latches to car bench.
customer_reviews.text: I got this after being in a wreck by myself and saw how much my kids booster seats moved. So i wanted some that latched onto the car and feel alot better about these. They are a little wider seated too which is good for my 7yo was not too comfy in her last chair. I do wish boosters were more padded but i couldnt find any. Love the latches. The cup is under the chair in a compartment. And the secret toy compartment im sure will be loved and sticky within a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Anchored is better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to replace older units. I didn’t think there was much new under the sun in terms of car seats, but I was wrong. These are fantastic! I recently bought a big Lincoln Navigator, and these look great in it. The anchor hooks are the best part. They secure the seats solidly. No more seats falling out during passenger embark/ debark. While I have no evidence to support it, I feel that these seats are significantly safer than unsecured units. I’ll likely buy three more for our other car soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Harper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat and how it hooks in the back makes me feel like it's safer for not being able to slip and slide around. I will say that the cupholder comes out which is kinda weird, and the seat itself is pretty wide and might not work best in small cars because it might cover the seatbelt input (I bought extensions to combat this issue and now it is fine) but it is a really nice seat in my opinion, and I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a booster car seat that stays put!
customer_reviews.text: This booster car seat is very sturdy and comfortable. The cupholder and "secret pocket" for snacks or treasures are great features. Best of all, it STAYS PUT because of the latch system which clips to the vehicle's tethering "bars." The latch clips are easy to use and make the booster very secure. No more having the booster seat slide out from under my granddaughter (which the old untethered one did all the time) or worrying about it becoming a flying object in an accident. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Booster seats are so convenient coming from a convertible car seat. The only reason I bought this product was the cup holder, which I had a hard time finding at first (it is on the underside of the booster seat). There is a slide out, but it is hardly used. Installing the few pieces were easy, but the cup holder was a bit of a pain. I love how the booster seat is so nimble and i can move the seat in the trunk without unhooking all those hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Lucius

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and remove.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 5 year old who has to continue using a carseat in Virginia. I like it because it hooks into the metal hooks under the seat and does not slide. It stays in place and has a cup holder. It loosens with the click of a button.
customer_reviews.author: nat4psu

customer_reviews.title: Measurements
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and the safety latches 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼. However, make sure you measure your backseats if you have a midsize sedan and especially if you plan to install 3 boosters. It can be very frustrating latching to seatbelt locks. However, I learned if you do not install the plastic cup holders it will allow more wiggle room for 3 boosters to fix in your 🚘 (Camery, Passat, Altima etc size sedans)
customer_reviews.author: T. Avant

customer_reviews.title: I love that these have the latch system to help keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and the most difficult thing assemblying them was getting the cup holder to snap in and the side tray to come out on the first one. I had no issues with the second one. I love that these have the latch system to help keep the seats (and grandkids) in place at all times. The extra few dollars to get the latch system on a booster is very much worth the cost over a cheaper seat. They were super easy to install in car. The kids told us just today that they like these seats as well. am very pleased with this purchase. HIGHLY recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: BabiesGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Latch on a booster! Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this seat has the latch attachment. I didn’t realize how helpful this was until I got this seat. It doesn’t move around the back seat of the car. My other boosters move when my son gets in and out of the car. It always seems to move right on top of the seatbelt. So annoyI got because then he has trouble clicking his seatbelt. This is so much SAFER! I’m going to replace the boosters in grandparents cars with this seat. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: AJ in NYC

customer_reviews.title: We love this car seat!!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this booster seat for about a week but so far we love it. My son is at the point where he could graduate to a backless booster seat and I wasn't a fan of the seats with no latch because they tended to slide all over our seats in the car. We found this one for a great price and we love it. It has a cup holder still for his drinks and the seat is soft and cushiony for longer car rides. I love this seat and will for sure be buying another for his daddy's car!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Easy and recommended for travel
customer_reviews.text: We use this for travel with our 5.5 yo boy. It is easy to install in most rentals/cars We like that it had the latch clips and my 5.5 yo enjoyed riding in it vs the car seat we have at home. Said it was comfortable and liked that there was a cup holder (stores on the bottom of seat). I thought the "snack tray" a little hard to get out but we didnt really need it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alspaugh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for safety
customer_reviews.text: Good directions, helpful for ease of instalation. Reading them first was very helpful for safe & correct installment. Easy to use after installed--my granddaughter buckles herself in independently. Sturdy & durable. Not inexpensive, but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Violet B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, light weight and perfect for our travel and home needs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a recent trip out of state and it worked great! It was light weight, easy to transport and easy to connect. I love that it has arm rests, a cup holder and a seat belt adjustment strap attached to it. I bought it just for traveling but now we use it regularly at home too. Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: JRW

customer_reviews.title: Too wide for Sedan
customer_reviews.text: Don't get wrong, its great and comfy, but its too wide, and my child can not buckle himself, I have to force the char to a side, to buckle the strap. We don't have SUV, its sedan BMW 528i, A friend of mine has  , the width of which is only 15' comparing to 17,5. Where her children can easily buckle themselves up.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy seat
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I like that it can be attached to the seat, great for when the seat is empty more than anything as it has the potential to fly around the car in an accident if it wasnt attached. The only drawback is that the cup holder doesn’t stay in place all that well. Noce that it’s removable for cleaning purposes but it would be better if it didnt keep falling out of place.
customer_reviews.author: cara joly

customer_reviews.title: Fit the CRV Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use when grandkids came for the holidays. They were easy to install and easy to remove. There was also enough room between the seats for a normal size person to fit. I wouldn't want to make a long trip that way, but, around town, it was perfect. Son has them in his vehicles for a long time. So, they are obviously durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: kcallahan47

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and wide seat. Safe clip to car though
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bulky and wide booster seat. Don’t put in the handle bars if you want the seat to fit in the back row of any vehicle with two other car seats because it won’t fit/ or will but very tight if the other car seats are slim. Put the handle bars on after installing in the car to see if it fits. I like the safe clip in the back of the booster seat to connect to the car!! Score right there with the easy pull string to get it out of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great car set for older kids
customer_reviews.text: Grandson grew out of the regular car seat and I decided to try this booster. It is perfect, it is easily attached and the front tightening straps are absolutely the best, makes getting the seat in and out very easy. Will purchase a second when the grand daughter is bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Kufahl

customer_reviews.title: Great recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this booster seat! I’m so glad my sister in law recommended it. I love that you can hook it to LATcH system for added security that it will stay in place. Also love the Seatbelt attachment that keeps the seat belt in the correct position for my son’s shoulder height. Cup holder is wonderful for my son. And the price is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and move from car to car if needed. Comfortable for our kids but small enough that it doesn’t take up a lot of space. Since it has seat anchors, adds piece of mind vs others from convertible car seats where the base is larger, heavier and don’t have seat anchors when using as booster. I’d recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: chino1978

customer_reviews.title: Child car booster seat
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is cool & pretty easy to install. I would however recommend getting the seat with the removeable back rest. Pay the extra $20 & have peace of mind. My son often falls asleep while riding in his booster seat & without the back rest he slomps over to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this booster clicks into the anchors in my car. Also, the little "drawer" on the side is a huge plus. I have a couple tissues and spare sunglasses for just in case. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster seat at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: My godson is going to need a Booster seat in the very near future. I remember that my stepson had one, which was very nice. Once he outgrew it, we gave it to another family member. It took me forever to remember the type of booster seat. And I am happy we remembered. This was/is a great booster seat. Very affordable! I am happy to give it to my godson. And, in turn, he will give it to his nephew/niece to be named in the future.
customer_reviews.author: El Juegador

customer_reviews.title: A really great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the Graco booster car seat. The fact that it attaches to our vehicle's latching system, in addition to the security of the shoulder belt, makes it very stable and safe. The seat is well-made and comes in a few very nice color combinations. The fabric is sturdy and attractive. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: H in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, feels safer, more comfortable and has holders for the child.  Recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: My six year old grand daughter loves this. It has the drink holder on one side and on the other is a pull out holder for snacks or whatever. I love it because it anchors best with the latch and I feel is safer. She says it is also more comfortable than the older version we had before. Recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, has latch system.
customer_reviews.text: SO easy to install and my 6 year old can now buckle himself in, which is a lifesaver while I’m struggling to get my 3 year old to even agree to get in the car. I like that it has a latch system which you rarely find on boosters like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Z.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good booster
customer_reviews.text: Extremely portable booster seat, very easy to use/install. Lightweight, decent cushioning. There is also a little tray for small items and a built in cup holder. From my experience it’s a good seat.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4 y.o. Granddaughter... it’s great quality, and high enough so the shoulder belt sits at the right spot!
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5year old LOVES it. Simpler and smaller than his full back convertible car seat. We use it all the time for my husbands car and also when grandma picks him up. Incredibly easy to install and my son carries it to the car for me it’s so light. Might buy another one for my mom to just keep.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shelton

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: This seat is good if you take your child for a quick trip to the super market. This is not a good seat for a long trip because the seat will shift and the strap will come loose.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this. The hidden compartment is their favorite. As for us, we love the anchors to hold the seats in place. Now my kids don't lean side to side when I take turns. It's built pretty solid and these are our third and hopefully last set.
customer_reviews.author: swanny

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful! Definitely Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: We use taxi's a lot, almost on a daily basis, this specific Graco model is so easy to fit and remove. We even carried it during our vacation (we took it as a carry on), and used it on the rental car. Its light weight, easy to use and carry. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Praven Ram Gopu

customer_reviews.title: Latch System is Superb! A Happy Mom!
customer_reviews.text: Once I discovered seats with the latch system, I have had no regrets about purchasing it. The seat is well padded and design is befitting for an age appropriate child. The latch hooks to the back adds a great safety measure and stability while I am driving my son in the car. Love the brand and design so much that I have purchased the high back version for my daughter. I highly recommend for every parent, purchase car seats with the latch hooks. It is far safer, secure and better than the ones without.
customer_reviews.author: Roxcy25

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for field trips
customer_reviews.text: My son is still in a five point harness, but has to have a booster for field trips. This was definitely the best choice. Very secure, easy to move and latch in. Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and yet safe rear booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and yet safe rear booster seat. Fits easily into my 2015 Chevy Impala which does have the safety seat clips to secure the seat in place. It was easy to install and is easy to remove when needed. It does ride a little low and my daughter can't see as well when compared to a normal car seat but that is to be expected. As she grows a little more this will be a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: FOS123

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This could not be easier to install. From the time I opened the package and had it installed, it took less than 10 minutes.The toggles on the back attach to the car seat attachment points and prevents it from moving around. My grandson loves it since there is no difficult harness to enclose him.
customer_reviews.author: T. Russo

customer_reviews.title: Great booster!
customer_reviews.text: A great transition from our girls’ car seats to a booster. They did struggle with getting their seat belt buckled around the arm rests correctly, but after some practice they got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy S.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband's truck and my MIL's ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's truck and my MIL's vehicle for my child to ride around town for that infrequent errands. We are sticking to 5-point harness for any drive other than that. My 53 lbs son likes it. He likes the compartment at the bottom and the cup holder. Bonus that this has the LATCH system. The arm rest also helps with the comfort factor
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeMom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it as our spare--our primary seat for my son is the Britax frontier 90, but it is so heavy and such a hassle when we have to move it to another car. The first time my son sat in this seat, he loved it! My husband seemed pretty impressed with it as well. Our son said he was really comfortable and enjoyed being able to see out the window (the frontier has head protectors that makes is difficult). The seatbelt clip was a nice touch & we love having a cupholder- that has become a must for us with any seat. All in all I think this was a great purchase for us!
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Good booster
customer_reviews.text: Update 1/2017: seat has worked until recently when one of the straps has become loose. It stays attached but isn't as snug as before. Obviously it will prevent the seat from flying around in the car but just a little strange that it would loosen up. Overall still happy with the seat and fits well in my Honda CRV
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this seat is to install and remove from my car. I like the added safety of the latch system in a booster seat, which stops it from sliding around while buckling. Great product for the price, comfortable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi199

customer_reviews.title: There's no better cost-effective compromise in comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased four of these seats, two for each of my primary vehicles. There's no better cost-effective compromise in comfort, safety, and appearance. The LATCH system is my favorite part, it's a simple process to secure the seats into the vehicle and avoid empty seats sliding around when unoccupied. They also stay in one place when being mounted or dismounted by wiggly four year olds. We did a 14 hour each way road trip to Florida over the summer, there were lots of complaints from the back seat - but none regarding the comfort of their bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Slick Willy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent booster
customer_reviews.text: I use this booster seat as a spare to have on hand to use in the grandparents' cars, and it works very well. It's easy to install, and my son finds it comfortable. Very good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthropod

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you want the seat secured to the vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because majority of the booster seats out there do not utilize the latch system they just use the weight from your child to stay and place and I do not like that one bit I wanted the seat to be secured to the care and this is one of the very few that actuklah secure to the vehicle via the latch system. A must for worry warts like me my son moves around to much and I don’t want the seat moving with him
customer_reviews.author: Harley Family

customer_reviews.title: No cup holder
customer_reviews.text: When traveling, your little one always wants something to drink and snack on. This has neither compartment. And because it has no back on it with side wings, their head is not supported while they sleep. Not sure if I'm keeping this or not.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. The latch system is a nice addition which keeps the empty booster seat in place when not in use. The kids also like the 'secret compartment' on it's side. Although it is a little tight so they often need help opening it. Would definitely recommend this booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Fi23

customer_reviews.title: Latch does not stay tight
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. I bought this specifically over the other graco booster seat for the latches. The belts should be a little longer for easier installation and removal. The latch straps can be tightened easily but does not stay tight - a little more than a nudge and it loosens. The seat itself is good though with the cup holder, retractable storage compartment .etc.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Best at what it's designed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat has served us well when my son was younger. I'd say the best thing about it was how easy it was to install using the anchors. We used to share one booster between two cars and finally gave in and bought the same exact model. Used both for more than 2 years without any problems. They just quietly sat at the back of our cars working as designed. And that's what we expected from them. I'd definitely recommend the Graco Affix booster seat to anyone looking for a hassle free and reliable booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpion E

customer_reviews.title: 2+year user, just bought an extra because it's the best.
customer_reviews.text: Love these booster seats, this is the second one I've bought. This second was purchased for grandparent's vehicle. They're sturdy, a little extra room width-wise than the other kind I'd bought for fiance's vehicle. I bought this one again because I liked the identical one I'd bought for my own vehicle. It's light enough I can have my son grab it from the vehicle to put in another, but heavy enough I don't worry about the construction of it. I've used the first one I bought for two years now, and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: great price for seat with useful features
customer_reviews.text: Nice deep cup holder prevents tip-overs and spills. Good feature. Accessory tray would probably be good for a few wet wipes. LATCH hooks which are relatively easy to attach then snug up are a big plus. Also has a adjustable tether for the shoulder belt to keep it in the proper place and off the child's neck. Comfortable seating surface. This is removable to be laundered, with instructions to reattach, though it might be a pain in the neck. There is a space to store the user's manual on the bottom of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! I love the color, and my son loves it as well! Easy to install in the vehicle also. Very glad I made this purchase! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: samanthaa🤍

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very easy to put in and take out of the vehicle. Our grandson likes it.
customer_reviews.author: KathyandTim

customer_reviews.title: Makes him feel like a big boy
customer_reviews.text: I have leather seats in my car, our son bought us one that did not have the straps and it slid all over my leather seats. We put the other one in Grandpa's truck. But now Grandson prefers this one as it does not have a back. Makes him feel like a big boy! He says it is very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Ouimette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was sceptical at first, but when we got them, loved them! I love that I can buckle the booster in like we could the car seat! Love the height, my son loves the cup holder, lol. It's great!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: FOR OUR GROWNING BOY
customer_reviews.text: AT AGE 6, OUYR GROWING BOY IS READY FOR A BOOSTER SEAT. NO MORE BABY SEATS FOR HIM. THIS GRACO IS GREAT. EASY TO INSTALL. FITS HIM WELL AND HE NOW HAS IS OWN WATER BOTTLE HOLDER. HE'S A HAPPY TRAVELLER.
customer_reviews.author: Julee M Neuhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Booster
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the transition out of a full car seat. The cup holder is a great addition. Light weight and clips into the seat. The seat belt adjuster works great for correctly positioning the seat belt. We’ve purchase 4 of these, so we can have a set in both cars. Easy enough to install for grandparents too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie K

customer_reviews.title: Securely fastened to anchor points in the car!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a booster seat that is firmly attached to the car! My daughter's first booster was a pretty substantial seat that I felt kept her safe but it was only supported by the seatbelt if there was an impact. This seat clips into the anchor points built into the seats. This keeps the seat secure all the time! If your child is not in a typical booster seat it'll fly all over the car if your involved in an accident. I bought 3 of these so each car has one firmly attached for our daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: The cup holder is nice and deep
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about purchasing these for our 6 year old twins because of the reviews saying that the two sides don't tighten equally, however we installed them in a minute and both sides tightened just find in our Honda Odyssey. There are actually two straps, they're just both on the left side, but you can pull them independently. The cup holder is nice and deep, more so than the one on the latch-less Graco backed boosters we had for them before. My kids say they are comfy and have no problems being able to get their seatbelts on with these. They are very easy to assemble (arm rests, cup holder) and install.
customer_reviews.author: LDH

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The hook latches are a great feature. Makes safety more attainable, and gives a sense a security knowing it won’t move around, considering the kiddos will be squirming in their seats.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Aldama

customer_reviews.title: Great SECURE Booster Seat
customer_reviews.text: We needed another booster for another car so we started looking. The other one we have does NOT have the clips to hold the booster in place and secure it to the car. You know, the little hoops tucked so deep in the crack of your car seats that you must mash and crush your hands into it to find the hoops. This booster has decent clips and keeps our 5 year old from sliding around the backseat. The cup holders are nice too. If our daughter keeps growing at the rate she is I'm sure we will buy 1, or 2, more.
customer_reviews.author: flipnotrab

customer_reviews.title: Best booster seat!
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is awesome. Very easy to install and use on an everyday basis. The only thing that gets a little annoying is the red plastic piece tends to slide down. I bought 2 of them because I love them so much. Wish I could have gotten a discount since I got 2.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: So easy even my dad can use it
customer_reviews.text: The latches are different than the convertible car seat that we have but after some getting used to or not having to use it is fine. The cup holder and the shoulder belt guide are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kashif Rizvi

customer_reviews.title: A great booster seat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this booster seat. He was thrilled to be big enough to transition into this from his full carseat and can now hop up and put his seatbelt on all by himself. Cozy seat, nice armrests, cup holder, etc. The material is nice and cleans up well. We haven't had any major spills on it or anything, but it still looks clean and has remained in great shape. Will be buying another one of these for our other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Burball

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love these seats. Easy to put in and take out of the car and light weight. Good for travel or everyday use. Also love the cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Cindie B

customer_reviews.title: Reliable car seat for shorter drives.
customer_reviews.text: Good booster seat for “about town” driving. Cup holder is worthless. First installment not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too wide for my car
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 grandkids (6 yr. and 4 yr. old twins). Three of these did not fit across the back of my smaller version SUV.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Niemer

customer_reviews.title: Great, safe, portable booster seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best portable seat. It locks into your cars safety harness and is easily portable. We like it so much, we even bought an extra for my in laws.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SEAT
customer_reviews.text: I got two, one for extra in case of emergency and one it is also good in case you are picking up your kids friends. Alyways good to have two, I would recommend this over all the other booster seats!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Son likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy! The color actually matched the interior of my car very well. My son likes it very much. He is especially proud to have his own cup holder!
customer_reviews.author: Ten miles

customer_reviews.title: Love the anchors
customer_reviews.text: Love that it anchors to the vehicle. The only downside is it is too big to fit in a suitcase, but if you take a cross body strap and hook it to the anchors, you can carry this easily through the airport. So much cheaper then renting car seats with every rental car!
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great child safety 👍
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and remove from the car. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Installing and moving from car to truck is a snap! The take up strap makes all the difference! Plenty of seat room for the next few years. Very happy with this booster seat from Graco
customer_reviews.author: The Newokie59

customer_reviews.title: Finally a booster with a seatbelt adjuster!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for seatbelt adjusters as my 6 yr old is too big for high back boosters. If I take the back off her old booster she was not high enough for the regular seatbelt to fit correctly and safely in her shoulder. I have noticed that many reviewers never even mention that this booster seat comes with an adjuster. GENIUS!!! Now she is really a big girl with the seatbelt sitting securely on her shoulder. She loves the cushion on the seat. She says is so soft! Great seat!
customer_reviews.author: D Arpino

customer_reviews.title: 3 months constant use, holding up well.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, kids like it, purchased two of them for our 6 yo boy/girl twins, used in first week for two 14hr drives and kids did great, no complaints (about their seats, that is ;). I'll post an update later if something changes.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Easy to tighten and loosen. Comfortable for the little one and great addition of a cup holder. Happy with this overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Better nd Safe.
customer_reviews.text: This is much easier for my granddaughter to get in and out of than the bottom of her old car seat. And it's connected to the set from safety.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kenworthy

customer_reviews.title: Attaches to safety latches!!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is amazing. I love that is attaches to the safety latches in the car so it doesn’t end up all over the car. And it is easy to tighten and undo from those latches. The cup holder is great and we love the secret hiding compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Terry

customer_reviews.title: Works alright, but seat is hard
customer_reviews.text: This is convenient, but NOT a good option for long car rides, seat is hard and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: badger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Liked the 'latch' system to keep the seat in place, very easy to install and nice having the cup holder and little storage shelf on other side.
customer_reviews.author: Ibroxson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. The seat itself is so soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The seat itself is so soft and easy to carry around. The only reason I am giving it a 4 star is because I need to buy another one and the price jumped $6. Worth the price though. The latch is convenient and so easy to use. I also don't have to worry about it moving all over the car when he isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up on sale. Have been looking for a Latch-equipped booster. Note that the cup holder is stored away in the underside of the seat for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: autotkgrad

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT For if you need car seats for a Jeep
customer_reviews.text: Bought specifically for my new Jeep The other car seats I have will not fit in the Jeep these were perfect fits secure highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy KC

customer_reviews.title: great back up
customer_reviews.text: we keep up couple of these in the van in case our nieces and nephews come over, their lightweight which is great to move them back and forth, and clip to the seat for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Vicci

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy seat, latch can be difficult to release
customer_reviews.text: The booster seat looks very nice, and my grandson enjoys the "secret drawer". The only complaint I have is the latch is difficult to release when the seat needs to be removed from the car. Otherwise, a good booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Sato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers ,easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good seat for what my needs are. It may not meet some people’s standards of hooking in but it’s really just a jump seat and it’s exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great, my daughter was very comfortable. I love that its very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this seat.
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat I bought a few others that didnt have the clips and as the boys shifted the seats did too. At one point the seat popped out from under my 5 year old grandson. Granted he was tickling his brother. I was under the impression that the seats were held in place by the belt buckle. My oldest is 29 and my youngest is 24. Things sure have changed. I would recommend this seat above others. Extremelly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product my 5 year old loves it. I bought it so she can have a booster when we travel and she used it on a surprised flight. It was nice because we didn't have to take a whole car seat and we just attached it to the luggage at the airport
customer_reviews.author: David Agpalo

customer_reviews.title: Love the latch system
customer_reviews.text: Simple booster seat with the two things we wanted - cup holder and Latch System so it didn't slide around in the backseat. Mom and kiddo approved.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Cat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We love this booster since it's so easy to put and take it out of the vehicle. We took it with us to the plane and it got dirty. Cleaning it is a little difficult but over all a good booster.
customer_reviews.author: Teran411

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install ,comfortable
customer_reviews.text: That car seat was the best on Amazon!!! Very easy to install, my daughter loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathe

product_meta.title: Graco AFFIX Backless Booster Car Seat, Pierce
product_meta.description: The AFFIX Backless Booster with Latch System helps safely transport your "big kid" from 40 to 100lbs and up to 57 inches tall. This seat provides a secure connection to your vehicle seat with its one-hand front-adjust latch system. With one hand, you can create a secure connection using your vehicle's anchors to keep the booster steadily in place. The connection secures the booster seat to your vehicle seat and makes self-buckling easier for your independent child. The seat has an integrated cup holder and hide-away storage compartment to keep child's drinks and favorite things within arm's reach. Parent's love that it secures the booster to their vehicle seat and aides in their child's growing independence.
feature_bullets: Backless Booster Car Seat to help safely transport your "big kid" from 40 to 100 pounds and from 40 to 57 inches tall
One hand front adjust booster seat with Latch System secures booster to vehicle seat
Secure connection keeps big kid booster seat properly in place
Front adjustment allows you to quickly and easily tighten the booster to the vehicle seats

Engineered & crash tested to meet or exceed US standard FMVSS 213. Side Impact Tested: In addition to meeting or exceeding all applicable US safety standards, the AFFIX Backless Youth Booster with Latch System has been side impact tested.Metal and plastic parts may be cleaned with mild soap and cool water

Graco ProtectPlus Engineered: a combination of the most rigorous crash tests that helps protect your child in frontal, side, rear & rollover crashes; additional testing based on the New Car Assessment Program and for extreme car interior temperatures
